name: @culli/perf
description: Perf comparisons and tests vs. official cycle packages
author: Matti Lankinen <m.lankinen@iki.fi> (https://github.com/milankinen)

scripts.onionify-app: browserify onionify-sum/index.js -v -t babelify -o onionify-sum/bundle.js && open onionify-sum/index.html
scripts.culli-app: browserify culli-sum/index.js -v -t babelify -o culli-sum/bundle.js && open culli-sum/index.html
scripts.motorcycle-app: browserify motorcycle-sum/index.js -v -t babelify -o motorcycle-sum/bundle.js && open motorcycle-sum/index.html
